results.title: Metformin-Embedded Hydrogels: A Promising Approach for Accelerating Healing in Diabetic Ulcers.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-Embedded Hydrogels: A Promising Approach for Accelerating Healing in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@Diabetic Ulcers@@@.

results.title: Revisiting metformin therapy for the mitigation of diabetic foot ulcer in patients with diabetic kidney disease from real-world evidence
results.text_hl: Although @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ potentially confers a wound-healing advantage, no well-established clinical evidence supports the benefit of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@diabetic foot ulcer@@@.

citations.NLM: Kwon S, Ha JH, Kim DK, Kim YS, Lim CS, Chang H, Lee JP, Park JU. Revisiting metformin therapy for the mitigation of diabetic foot ulcer in patients with diabetic kidney disease from real-world evidence Int Wound J. 2023 Sep 23;():. PMID: 37740678

results.title: Diabetic foot ulcer: Successful healing with combination therapy, including surgical debridement, maggot therapy, and negative pressure wound therapy
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@Diabetic foot ulcers@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@DFUs@@@) are a common and serious complication of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Babamiri B, Nikkhah F, Faraji N, Goli R, Moghaddam NV, Rahimi K. Diabetic foot ulcer: Successful healing with combination therapy, including surgical debridement, maggot therapy, and negative pressure wound therapy Int J Surg Case Rep. 2023 Aug 19;110():108695. PMID: 37603913

results.title: Vitamin B12 and Diabetic Foot: Alpha Mini-Review.
results.text_hl: It was demonstrated that @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@B12 deficiency@@@ seems to be related to @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@DFUs@@@ in cases of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration and bariatric surgery.

citations.NLM: Karakousis ND, Pyrgioti EE, Georgakopoulos PN, Papanas N. Vitamin B12 and Diabetic Foot: Alpha Mini-Review. Int J Low Extrem Wounds. 2022 Nov 29;():15347346221143018. PMID: 36448193

results.title: pH/Glucose Dual Responsive Metformin Release Hydrogel Dressings with Adhesion and Self-Healing via Dual-Dynamic Bonding for Athletic Diabetic Foot Wound Healing.
results.text_hl: In summary, adhesion-enhanced self-healing multifunctional @CHEMICAL_CP_protocol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C053518 @@@PC@@@/@CHEMICAL_graphene_oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000628730 @@@GO@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ hydrogels with stimuli-responsive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ release ability and easy removability have shown a promoting effect on the healing of chronic athletic @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ wounds and provide a local-specific drug dual-response release strategy for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@type II diabetic feet@@@.

citations.NLM: Liang Y, Li M, Yang Y, Qiao L, Xu H, Guo B. pH/Glucose Dual Responsive Metformin Release Hydrogel Dressings with Adhesion and Self-Healing via Dual-Dynamic Bonding for Athletic Diabetic Foot Wound Healing. ACS Nano. 2022 Feb 22;16(2):3194-3207. PMID: 35099927
citations.BibTeX: @article{35099927, title={pH/Glucose Dual Responsive Metformin Release Hydrogel Dressings with Adhesion and Self-Healing via Dual-Dynamic Bonding for Athletic Diabetic Foot Wound Healing.}, author={Liang Y and Li M and Yang Y and Qiao L and Xu H and Guo B}, journal={ACS Nano}, volume={16}, number={2}, pages={3194-3207}}

results.title: Clinical Utilization Pattern of Multiple Strengths of Glimepiride and Metformin Fixed Dose Combinations in Indian Type 2 Diabetes Patients.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@Glimepiride@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ fixed dose combinations were among the preferred choices in various complications like @DISEASE_Nervous_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009422 @@@neuropathy@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertensive_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D058437 @@@retinopathy@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@nephropathy@@@, @DISEASE_Peripheral_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D016491 @@@peripheral vascular disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@diabetic foot@@@ and @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Ag U, K P, J G, S V, Mv A. Clinical Utilization Pattern of Multiple Strengths of Glimepiride and Metformin Fixed Dose Combinations in Indian Type 2 Diabetes Patients. J Assoc Physicians India. 2020 Jul;68(7):57-61. PMID: 32602682

results.title: [Study of effect of tongsaimai tablets on experimental diabetic foot model rats].
results.text_hl: METHOD: Male SD @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were selected to duplicate the @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@diabetic foot ulcer@@@ model and randomly divided into the blank control group, the model group, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment group, and TSM 12.44, 6.22, 3.11 g x kg(-1) groups (n = 10).

citations.NLM: Guo J, Meng QH, Yin QY, Lin C, Ma Z, Xu B, Qian X, Bao DQ, Zhang YY, Zhang QC, Bian HM, Hu XY. [Study of effect of tongsaimai tablets on experimental diabetic foot model rats]. Zhongguo Zhong Yao Za Zhi. 2014 Jun;39(11):2091-6. PMID: 25272849

results.title: Metformin Effect on Endocan Biogenesis in Human Endothelial Cells Under Diabetic Condition.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Data demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could promote angiogenic potential of endothelial cells which its reduction is a main cause in the development of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@diabetic foot ulcer@@@, probably by the regulation of @GENE_ESM1 @GENE_11082 @@@endocan@@@ dynamics under high @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ condition.

citations.NLM: Zolali E, Rezabakhsh A, Nabat E, Jaberi H, Rahbarghazi R, Garjani A. Metformin Effect on Endocan Biogenesis in Human Endothelial Cells Under Diabetic Condition. Arch Med Res. 2019 Jul;50(5):304-314. PMID: 31600602
